mapper.sql: USERS_ID, PRIMARY_MEMBER_GROUP_ID, PRIMARY_IP, LOGIN_NAME, DISPLAY_NAME, PASSWORD, PASS_SALT, DATE_REGISTERED, LANGUAGE, LAST_LOGIN, PERSONAL_TEXT, GENDER_ID, BIRTH_DATE, WEBSITE_TITLE, WEBSITE_URL, LOCATION, SHOW_ONLINE_FLAG, TIME_FORMAT, SIGNATURE, ACTIVE_FLAG, TIME_OFFSET, PM_EMAIL_NOTIF_FLAG, AVATAR_ID, USER_TITLE, TOTAL_TIME_LOGGED_IN, WARN_LEVEL, LOCKED_UNTIL, LOGIN_FAILED_ATTEMPTS, CUSTOM_TITLE, ACTIVE_CONNECTIONS
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from users
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(USERS_ID) + 1 FROM users
insert into users (USERS_ID, PRIMARY_MEMBER_GROUP_ID, PRIMARY_IP, LOGIN_NAME, DISPLAY_NAME, PASSWORD, PASS_SALT, DATE_REGISTERED, LANGUAGE, LAST_LOGIN, PERSONAL_TEXT, GENDER_ID, BIRTH_DATE, WEBSITE_TITLE, WEBSITE_URL, LOCATION, SHOW_ONLINE_FLAG, TIME_FORMAT, SIGNATURE, ACTIVE_FLAG, TIME_OFFSET, PM_EMAIL_NOTIF_FLAG, AVATAR_ID, USER_TITLE, TOTAL_TIME_LOGGED_IN, WARN_LEVEL, LOCKED_UNTIL, LOGIN_FAILED_ATTEMPTS, CUSTOM_TITLE, ACTIVE_CONNECTIONS ) values (#{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{primaryMemberGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{primaryIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{passSalt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dateRegistered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{language,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{personalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{genderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{websiteTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showOnlineFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{timeFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activeFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{timeOffset,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{pmEmailNotifFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{avatarId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalTimeLoggedIn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{warnLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lockedUntil,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginFailedAttempts,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{customTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activeConnections,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update users
USERS_ID = #{record.usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRIMARY_MEMBER_GROUP_ID = #{record.primaryMemberGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRIMARY_IP = #{record.primaryIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_NAME = #{record.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISPLAY_NAME = #{record.displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=CHAR},
PASS_SALT = #{record.passSalt,jdbcType=CHAR},
DATE_REGISTERED = #{record.dateRegistered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LANGUAGE = #{record.language,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_LOGIN = #{record.lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PERSONAL_TEXT = #{record.personalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER_ID = #{record.genderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BIRTH_DATE = #{record.birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WEBSITE_TITLE = #{record.websiteTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_URL = #{record.websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCATION = #{record.location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOW_ONLINE_FLAG = #{record.showOnlineFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
TIME_FORMAT = #{record.timeFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGNATURE = #{record.signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE_FLAG = #{record.activeFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
TIME_OFFSET = #{record.timeOffset,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PM_EMAIL_NOTIF_FLAG = #{record.pmEmailNotifFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
AVATAR_ID = #{record.avatarId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_TITLE = #{record.userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_TIME_LOGGED_IN = #{record.totalTimeLoggedIn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WARN_LEVEL = #{record.warnLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
LOCKED_UNTIL = #{record.lockedUntil,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOGIN_FAILED_ATTEMPTS = #{record.loginFailedAttempts,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CUSTOM_TITLE = #{record.customTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE_CONNECTIONS = #{record.activeConnections,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update users set USERS_ID = #{record.usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRIMARY_MEMBER_GROUP_ID = #{record.primaryMemberGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRIMARY_IP = #{record.primaryIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_NAME = #{record.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAY_NAME = #{record.displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=CHAR}, PASS_SALT = #{record.passSalt,jdbcType=CHAR}, DATE_REGISTERED = #{record.dateRegistered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LANGUAGE = #{record.language,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LAST_LOGIN = #{record.lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PERSONAL_TEXT = #{record.personalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDER_ID = #{record.genderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BIRTH_DATE = #{record.birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WEBSITE_TITLE = #{record.websiteTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE_URL = #{record.websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCATION = #{record.location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOW_ONLINE_FLAG = #{record.showOnlineFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, TIME_FORMAT = #{record.timeFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGNATURE = #{record.signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE_FLAG = #{record.activeFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, TIME_OFFSET = #{record.timeOffset,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PM_EMAIL_NOTIF_FLAG = #{record.pmEmailNotifFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, AVATAR_ID = #{record.avatarId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_TITLE = #{record.userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_TIME_LOGGED_IN = #{record.totalTimeLoggedIn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WARN_LEVEL = #{record.warnLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, LOCKED_UNTIL = #{record.lockedUntil,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOGIN_FAILED_ATTEMPTS = #{record.loginFailedAttempts,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CUSTOM_TITLE = #{record.customTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE_CONNECTIONS = #{record.activeConnections,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update users
PRIMARY_MEMBER_GROUP_ID = #{primaryMemberGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRIMARY_IP = #{primaryIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISPLAY_NAME = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR},
PASS_SALT = #{passSalt,jdbcType=CHAR},
DATE_REGISTERED = #{dateRegistered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LANGUAGE = #{language,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_LOGIN = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PERSONAL_TEXT = #{personalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER_ID = #{genderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BIRTH_DATE = #{birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WEBSITE_TITLE = #{websiteTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_URL = #{websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOW_ONLINE_FLAG = #{showOnlineFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
TIME_FORMAT = #{timeFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGNATURE = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE_FLAG = #{activeFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
TIME_OFFSET = #{timeOffset,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PM_EMAIL_NOTIF_FLAG = #{pmEmailNotifFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
AVATAR_ID = #{avatarId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_TITLE = #{userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_TIME_LOGGED_IN = #{totalTimeLoggedIn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WARN_LEVEL = #{warnLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
LOCKED_UNTIL = #{lockedUntil,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOGIN_FAILED_ATTEMPTS = #{loginFailedAttempts,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CUSTOM_TITLE = #{customTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE_CONNECTIONS = #{activeConnections,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where USERS_ID = #{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update users set PRIMARY_MEMBER_GROUP_ID = #{primaryMemberGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRIMARY_IP = #{primaryIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAY_NAME = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, PASS_SALT = #{passSalt,jdbcType=CHAR}, DATE_REGISTERED = #{dateRegistered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LANGUAGE = #{language,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LAST_LOGIN = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PERSONAL_TEXT = #{personalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDER_ID = #{genderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BIRTH_DATE = #{birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WEBSITE_TITLE = #{websiteTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE_URL = #{websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOW_ONLINE_FLAG = #{showOnlineFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, TIME_FORMAT = #{timeFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGNATURE = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE_FLAG = #{activeFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, TIME_OFFSET = #{timeOffset,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PM_EMAIL_NOTIF_FLAG = #{pmEmailNotifFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, AVATAR_ID = #{avatarId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_TITLE = #{userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_TIME_LOGGED_IN = #{totalTimeLoggedIn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WARN_LEVEL = #{warnLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, LOCKED_UNTIL = #{lockedUntil,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOGIN_FAILED_ATTEMPTS = #{loginFailedAttempts,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CUSTOM_TITLE = #{customTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE_CONNECTIONS = #{activeConnections,jdbcType=INTEGER} where USERS_ID = #{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT G.GROUP_NAME FROM LKUP_MEMBER_GROUP G INNER JOIN BR_MEMBER_GROUP_USER U ON U.MEMBER_GROUP_ID = G.MEMBER_GROUP_ID WHERE U.USERS_ID = #{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT U.USERS_ID, U.DISPLAY_NAME FROM users U JOIN BR_USER_CONVERSATION C ON C.USERS_ID = U.USERS_ID WHERE C.PM_CONVERSATION_ID = #{conversationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users U WHERE U.USERS_ID = #{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND U.PASSWORD = SHA2(CONCAT((SELECT P.PASS_SALT FROM users P WHERE P.USERS_ID = #{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}), #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), 256)
